trans-unit.source: In the MainPage.xaml.cs project file, add the following **using** statements:
trans-unit.target: In the MainPage.xaml.cs project file, add the following **using** statements:

trans-unit.source: Replace the **AuthenticateAsync** method with the following code:
trans-unit.target: Replace the **AuthenticateAsync** method with the following code:

trans-unit.source: In this version of **AuthenticateAsync**, the app tries to use credentials stored in the **PasswordVault** to access the service.
trans-unit.target: In this version of **AuthenticateAsync**, the app tries to use credentials stored in the **PasswordVault** to access the service.

trans-unit.source: A regular sign-in is also performed when there is no stored credential.
trans-unit.target: A regular sign-in is also performed when there is no stored credential.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.NOTE]A cached token may be expired, and token expiration can also occur after authentication when the app is in use.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.NOTE]A cached token may be expired, and token expiration can also occur after authentication when the app is in use.

trans-unit.source: To learn how to determine if a token is expired, see [Check for expired authentication tokens](http://aka.ms/jww5vp).
trans-unit.target: To learn how to determine if a token is expired, see [Check for expired authentication tokens](http://aka.ms/jww5vp).

trans-unit.source: For a solution to handling authorization errors related to expiring tokens, see the post [Caching and handling expired tokens in Azure Mobile Services managed SDK](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/carlosfigueira/archive/2014/03/13/caching-and-handling-expired-tokens-in-azure-mobile-services-managed-sdk.aspx).
trans-unit.target: For a solution to handling authorization errors related to expiring tokens, see the post [Caching and handling expired tokens in Azure Mobile Services managed SDK](http://blogs.msdn.com/b/carlosfigueira/archive/2014/03/13/caching-and-handling-expired-tokens-in-azure-mobile-services-managed-sdk.aspx).

trans-unit.source: Notice that on the first start-up, sign-in with the provider is again required.
trans-unit.target: Notice that on the first start-up, sign-in with the provider is again required.

trans-unit.source: However, on the second restart the cached credentials are used and sign-in is bypassed.
trans-unit.target: However, on the second restart the cached credentials are used and sign-in is bypassed.
